name: Creeping Cold (Dat1Doge)
description:
A top-down high score survival game made for Vim Jam 3.0. Play as a survivor who needs to keep their fire going in order to survive. Collect wood to build defenses and fuel the fire, while also killing the incoming enemies.

Notes:

1. You don't collide with the defenses you create, only enemies do.

2. The fast leech enemies take away your wood.

3. The exit button won't work in the browser version.

4. You cannot deposit wood in the fire if you're in build mode.

Credits:

All code and art was made by me

Fire crackling was sourced from the unity asset store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/nature/nature-essentials-208...

Hit sound effects made using SFXR

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys for movement

Space to enter/exit build mode

Right click to create building in build mode

Left click to attack
